alert.note: Alert for Adams; Buffalo; Franklin; Hall; Harlan; Kearney; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 8:54AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Franklin, southeastern Phelps, western Adams, Kearney and northeastern Harlan Counties through 930 AM CDT... At 854 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kenesaw to near Funk. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Holdrege, Minden, Kenesaw, Juniata, Axtell, Hildreth, Wilcox, Roseland, Holstein, Funk, Upland, Ayr, Heartwell, Norman and Ragan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Buffalo; Franklin; Hall; Harlan; Kearney; Phelps
